messages.subject: Pen Pals
messages.msgSnippet: I read someone on here saying something about pen pals a while ago and I meant to respond but didn t. There is a pen pal group for folks who teach/learn at
messages.messageBody:
I read someone on here saying something about pen pals a while ago and I meant to respond but didn't. There is a pen pal group for folks who teach/learn at home. Right now they have apost card exchange goin on with folks all over the world and a homeschool holiday card exchange.

Here is a family from there looking for post cards from all over the world:

We are learning about the continents and different countries in each continent.
We would like to get postcards from as many different countries as possible. We
will send one in return!

If you can send one to them from anotehr country go here and email them please:



http://groups.yahoo.com/group/homeschoolpen-pals/?yguid=188090558

You can also find out about the card exchange there too. You will be put onto a list for teh card exchange of about 15 to 18 families/childfren and wqill need to send a card to each one. The post cards, you can send one or long on and ask for as many to exchange with as you want. you can still get a snail mail or email pen pal here too!

Pebs
